techmeme.title: Apple announces Apple Watch Series 10, with a thinner design, a bigger screen, smaller bezels, a new polished aluminum Jet Black finish, faster charging, more (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
Livestream of Apple's "It's Glow Time" event from Apple Park (Apple)
A live blog of Apple's It's Glowtime event, where four new iPhones are expected, and rumors suggest a new Apple Watch and two AirPods models could be announced (The Verge)
AMD announces it will eventually move to a unified UDNA GPU architecture, bringing RDNA and CDNA together, as it hopes to rival Nvidia's CUDA ecosystem (Paul Alcorn/Tom's Hardware)
Automation and IT monitoring company Progress agrees to acquire Raleigh-based file management platform ShareFile for $875M in cash and credit (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
